title: Sample, "Tent"
medium:
Medium: linen (51%), goat hair (29%), and rayon (20%)
Technique: plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 30.5 x 59.7 cm (12 x 23 1/2 in.); two pieces stapled together
description: Plain weave of variegated grey and narrow green, magenta, violet, orange, dark red and gold vertical stripes. The grey striped areas are comprised off-white warps while the wefts are comprised of white threads loosely twisted with black goat hair. The green, magenta, violet, orange, dark red and gold stripes are made of heavier warp threads with a slight sheen. Number 1519.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "Tent".
Medium: linen (51%), goat hair (29%), and rayon (20%)
Technique: plain weave. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-525.
